subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical monument is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में कौन सा भवन है?
explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a historical monument located in Jaipur, Rajasthan. It is a palace built with intricate lattice work and is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: हावा महाल जापान के राजस्थान में स्थित है। यह पाल का संस्थान के लिखनी का संस्थान की एक प्रमों में सर्वेंचरैंचर मानवकोंचर है।
question_en: Which historical monument is located in Jaipur?
